info.readme:
uBlogsy is a blog package for Umbraco 4.7.1 and above.
It uses the awesomeness of Razor.
Enjoy!
Note: Comment links look great when using nice urls. To do this, set umbracoUseDirectoryUrls = true in your web.config.

uBlogsyEmailTemplate.uBlogsyEmailBody:
##CommenterName## has sent you a message...

 

Sender email: ##CommenterEmail##

Sender website: ##CommenterWebsite##

 

"##CommentBody##"

Powered by uBlogsy and Umbraco

##CommenterName## has left a comment on the post ##PostTitle##...

 

email:  ##CommenterEmail##

 


"##CommentBody##"

If auto publishing of comments is not enabled, you need to log in to publish the comment.

Powered by uBlogsy and Umbraco

Hi ##RecipientName##

 

##CommenterName## has left a comment on the post "##PostTitle##"...

 

"##CommentBody##"

Click here to view and reply.

 

To unsubscribe from notifications click here

Powered by uBlogsy and Umbraco

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Base DocType
Info.Description: This document type exists to allow sorting and categorisation of sub-document types. Do not create content nodes using this document type!

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Base Page
Info.Description: This document type exists to allow sorting and categorisation of sub-document types. Do not create content nodes using this document type!

GenericProperty.Name: Keywords
GenericProperty.Description: Used for meta keywords. When this is empty, the title of the page is used.

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: Used for meta description. When this is empty, an exerpt of the body text of the page is used.

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Comment
Info.Description: This document type is for comments. It is automatically created under a post when someone writes you a comment.

GenericProperty.Name: Is Author Comment
GenericProperty.Description: This should be selected if this comment is a comment from an author.

GenericProperty.Name: Public Domain
GenericProperty.Description:
Some Umbraco implementations have separate domains for the same content, and also admin domains eg. yoursite.com, admin.yoursite.com
This property is to ensure that when a comment is approved (by the admin in the dashboard), notification emails will contain url's which are from the original public domain.
This property is filled automatically after the comment submission.

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Container : Blog
Info.Description: This document type is a container for the blog section. It is here for organising content tree. There is only meant to be one of these. It is not required.

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Container : Comments
Info.Description: This document type is a folder for comments. It is automatically created and published when the blog post is published.

GenericProperty.Name: Subscription Meta Data
GenericProperty.Description: A "\n" delimited list of subscribers in the form memberId|email|createdDate eg. 1979|test@bla.com|24/06/2011 11:16:26

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Container : Pages
Info.Description: This document type holds pages. It is simply for organising the content tree. There should only be one of these.

GenericProperty.Name: Contact Email Override
GenericProperty.Description: Overrides contact email set in landing node.

GenericProperty.Name: Reply To Address Override
GenericProperty.Description: Overrides reply-to address defined in landing node

GenericProperty.Name: Email Body
GenericProperty.Description: Tokenised html email. These tokens are not replaceable.

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Folder : Month
Info.Description: This folder is optional. You do not have to organise your posts by month. You may wish to put your posts just under a year folder.

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Folder : Year
Info.Description:
This document type is a container for your blog posts. You must name these 2009, 2010, 2011 etc
You may wish to create month nodes under this node, or to put all your posts directly under the year.

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Landing
Info.Description: This is the root of your blog. It is required. There can be multiple of these.

GenericProperty.Name: Auto Approve Comments
GenericProperty.Description: Check this box to auto-approve all messages which are NOT spam. You should not be auto-approving spam anyway :)

GenericProperty.Name: Title
GenericProperty.Description: The title which is shown in your RSS feed

GenericProperty.Name: Contact Email
GenericProperty.Description: This email address is used by the contact form. It should be your email address.

GenericProperty.Name: Blog Roll Links
GenericProperty.Description:
A list of blogs you want to follow. Make sure it's one per line.
e.g http://feeds.feedburner.com/midcodecrisis http://feeds.feedburner.com/umbracoblog

GenericProperty.Name: Subscription Reply-to Email
GenericProperty.Description: This email address will appear to subscribers of comments. Ideally it should be something like no-reply@yourdomain.com

GenericProperty.Name: Comment Notification
GenericProperty.Description: Select this checkbox if you want to be emailed when someone submits a comment to one of your posts.

GenericProperty.Name: Default Author
GenericProperty.Description: This author is used when none are defined in a post.

GenericProperty.Name: Auto Delete Spam
GenericProperty.Description:
Check this box to delete spam messages.
When this box is NOT checked, detected spam messages will appear on the dashboard for your approval. They will also appear as unpublished nodes under the relative blog post.
This requires an Akismet license (see below).

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: The description of your RSS feed

GenericProperty.Name: Use Summary On Landing
GenericProperty.Description: Select this to use post summaries on the main page, instead of whole posts.

GenericProperty.Name: Akismet API Key
GenericProperty.Description: Akismet is a service which helps detect spam. To help protect your blog against spam, you can purchase a license here: http://akismet.com

GenericProperty.Name: Copyright
GenericProperty.Description:
Copyright information which is shown in your RSS feed.
e.g Mid-code Crisis

GenericProperty.Name: Show Social Media Links
GenericProperty.Description: Select this to show social media sharing links under each post.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable All Comments
GenericProperty.Description: Select this to disable all new comments on posts.

GenericProperty.Name: Use Title As Node Name
GenericProperty.Description:
Deselect this if you want to have a post title which is different to your post's node name.
eg. If you want your title to be "My title" but you want the post url to be /posts/2011/01/my-cool-title/ instead of /posts/2011/01/my-title/
Selected by default.

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Page
Info.Description: This document type is for simple pages.

Info.Name: uBlogsy - Post
Info.Description: This document type is for your blog posts. Put these posts directly under the year folder or under a month folder.

GenericProperty.Name: Author
GenericProperty.Description: There can be multiple authors separated by ",".

GenericProperty.Name: Categories
GenericProperty.Description: These categories are predefined and can only be changed by a developer.

GenericProperty.Name: Tags
GenericProperty.Description: Remember to click save (or publish)!

GenericProperty.Name: Disable Comments
GenericProperty.Description: Allows you to disable comments to this post. Note that comments that already exist will remain viewable.

Info.Name: uBlogsy - RSS
Info.Description: This document type exists only for an RSS feed. There should only be one of these.

Template.Name: uBlogsyBase
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/umbraco/masterpages/default.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>
<asp:Content ContentPlaceHolderID="ContentPlaceHolderDefault" runat="server"> <asp:contentplaceholder id="ContentPlaceHolderDefault" runat="server" /> </asp:Content>

Template.Name: uBlogsyBaseSite
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uBlogsyBase.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %> <%--get title for browser--%> <%--get meta title and description--%>

<%--get site name--%> @{ var landing = uBlogsy.BusinessLogic.DataService.Instance.GetLanding(Model.Id); @landing.uBlogsyContentTitle }

<%--top navigation--%>
<%--search--%> <%--rss link--%> <%--list of authors--%> <%--list of categories--%> <%--the awesome tag cloud--%> <%--list of related posts--%> <%--list of latest posts--%> <%--list of latest comments--%> <%--archive--%> <%--alternate archive layout --%> <%-- --%> <%--list blog roll --%>
@{ var landing = uBlogsy.BusinessLogic.DataService.Instance.GetLanding(Model.Id); @Html.Raw(landing.uBlogsyContentFooter) }
Powered by uBlogsy and Umbraco

Template.Name: uBlogsyComment
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uBlogsyBase.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

<asp:Content ContentPlaceHolderID="ContentPlaceHolderDefault" runat="server">
    
    <umbraco:Macro runat="server" Language="razor">
    @{
        string hash = Model.Url.Replace(Model.Parent.Url, string.Empty);
        string url = Model.Parent.Parent.Url + "#!/" + hash;
        Response.Redirect(url);
    }
    </umbraco:Macro>
</asp:Content>

Template.Name: uBlogsyFolder
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uBlogsyBase.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

<asp:Content ContentPlaceHolderID="ContentPlaceHolderDefault" runat="server">
    <umbraco:Macro runat="server" Language="razor">
    @{
       var last = @Model.Children.LastOrDefault();
       if (last != null){
          Response.Redirect(last.Url);
       }
       else{
          var landing = uBlogsy.BusinessLogic.DataService.Instance.GetLanding(Model.Id);
          Response.Redirect(landing.Url);
       }
    }
    </umbraco:Macro>
</asp:Content>

Template.Name: uBlogsyLanding
Template.Design: <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uBlogsyBaseSite.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

Template.Name: uBlogsyPage
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uBlogsyBaseSite.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %> @{

@Model.uBlogsyContentTitle

}

Template.Name: uBlogsyPost
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uBlogsyBaseSite.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %> <%@ Register TagPrefix="uBlogsy" TagName="Contact" Src="~/usercontrols/uBlogsy/Contact.ascx" %>

<%= umbraco.library.GetDictionaryItem("uBlogsyDicContactFormPostComment")%>

Template.Name: uBlogsyRSS
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/umbraco/masterpages/default.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

<%--NOTE: this file must be kept in this format because the xml declaration must be in the first line.--%>
<asp:Content ID="Content1" ContentPlaceHolderID="ContentPlaceHolderDefault" runat="server"><script type="text/C#" runat="server">
    protected override void OnPreRender(EventArgs e)
    {
        Response.Clear();
        Response.ContentType = "text/xml";
        Response.ContentEncoding = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8;
    }
</script><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?><umbraco:macro ID="Macro1" runat="server" Alias="uBlogsyRSS" />
</asp:Content>

Stylesheet.Name: uBlogsy
